name: Ghost Castle (itch)
description:
Welcome to Yuureijou: Ghost Castle! Inspired by Japanese Famicom games from the 80s!

A puzzle-platformer where the only way to get ahead is to lose your head! Your past failures are the key to your future success! This is a five stage prototype made for a game jam.

Play in your browser!

Winner of the Philly Dev Night Death Jam!

UPDATE: Sunday, May 22: fixed a couple of bugs in the prototype levels!
